title: THE LIFE AND TIMES OF A 6/2 SPLENIC PROJECTOR BEFORE HUMAN DESIGN: Memoirs of an Old Indigo Child
description: A detailed account of learning about Human Designs Strategy and Authority 20 years before Ra brought it to light. This book was originally written for my daughter, Deirdre, but as my fellow Projectors saw pieces of it, they wanted to read it, so, a blending of the original "Memoirs of an Old Indigo Child" into the current title, "The Life and Times of an Old 6/2 Splenic Projector Before Human Design". Thanks for looking. Our facebook page
author: James Delbert Toon Jr.
